downloadTitle: Business Process Diagram Templates for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2
downloadDescription: ​This download includes Microsoft Visio diagrams for the business processes in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2.
detailsSection:
You can use these diagrams as templates for your own customized business process diagrams. The following business processes are included:
  • Accounts payable
  • Accounts receivable
  • Budgeting
  • Cash and bank management
  • Compliance and internal controls
  • General ledger
  • Human resources
  • Inventory and warehouse management
  • Master planning
  • Procurement and sourcing
  • Product information management
  • Production control
  • Travel and expense
  • Sales and marketing
  • Public sector
  • Project management and accounting
  • Service management
  • Retail
